div1.p: Memorandum of Stephen F. Austin's debts.

S. F. Austins note to Kelly and Coats dated July 23d 1819 for________ 162. 00
" " " to William M Ohara at 6m. dated 25th Feby 1819 for_____ 650. 00
" " " " at 12 m ___________________________ 650. 00
" " " Freman and Kelly due the 1st August 1819______________ 275. 00
S. F Austins Rect to W M oHara for Robt Andrews note for 200 dated 26 Feby 1819 $100 of which was due Ohara_____________________ 100. 00 _________ $1837. 00
[Endorsed:] Memorandum of S. F. Austins Notes paid by J P Bryan in Missouri
